title: Werkplaats Typografie
content:
Does anyone have any information about Werkplaats Typografie in the Netherlands? I'm interested in attending but would like to know more about the program. Thanks!

Here's the link: [http://www.werkplaatstypografie.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417044924/http:/www.werkplaatstypografie.org/ "http://www.werkplaatstypografie.org")
author: mooci

comments.content:
Peter Bilak is a teacher at Werkplaats Typografie.  
This is his e-mailadres: [info@typotheque.com](mailto:info@typotheque.com)

Pieter

Hello Mocci,  
I am also very interested in finding out more about this.  
Considering taking them up on the offer of a visit.  
As you cant find out too much about applying from the site.  
Let me know if peter gets back to you.  
Good luck

Simon
